product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Trekker Stormproof Lighter - 2012 Overstock
long_description: When other lighters fail the Ultimate Survival Technologies Trekker Stormproof Lighter keeps going strong. It's designed to operate in adverse weather and a rubberized casing makes it watertight.
short_description: When other lighters fail the Ultimate Survival Technologies Trekker Stormproof Lighter keeps going strong. It's designed to operate in adverse weather and a rubberized casing makes it watertight.
